name: Alice (Oculus Rift)
description:
Game from the Emotionnal Game Jam 2017. Discover what happens last night, and maybe more... Go throught the choices and the story of your character, and lead him to the end of this 5-10 minutes experience.

Winner ex aequo of the Emotionnal Game Jam 2017 !

Game from :
Eric Barbedor
David Camus
Marc Aubry-Boissel
Emilien Grudé

What you need :
Oculus Rift - Height calibration 1m80 - Sitting play - Xbox controller
